categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Graham was a male Human Moff of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he and Moff Dolus were invited by a fellow Moff Valion Pyron to observe the testing of the Silencer on the Harrower-class dreadnought Doombringer. When Pyron introduces Lord Kallig as the one responsible for the completion of the Silencer, Graham voiced his annoyance of Dark Council member Darth Thanaton. Before the testing, Captain Joris of Darth Achelon's flagship Carnage requested aid and Graham suggested to destroy Achelon. After the successful testing of the Silencer, Graham agreed to support Kallig.
Moff Graham appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission.
